page.title: 06CROPS FOUND ON THE FARM
page.content: HAY OATS BARLEY WHEAT GRASS FOR SILAGE THE CORN IS PLANTED IN THE AUTUMN { MACHINERY USED ON THE FARM A MOWER-TO CUT GRASS FOR SILAGE OR HAY FORAGE WAGON-TO PICK UP GRASS FOR SILAGE MAKING. BUCK RAKE-PUTS GRASS ONTO SILAGE PIT BALER-BALES HAY AND STRAW TURNER AND GRASS SPINNER MOVE AND TURN THE HAY WHILE IT IS DRYING FOR THE CORN,OATS AND BARLEY A PLOUGH, POWERHARROW, SEED DRILL, COMBINE AND BALER.THE BARLEY,OATS ETC. ARE SPRAYED WITH PROPUAECIC ACID TO KEEP CROPS IN GOOD CONDITION. THE WHEAT IS SOLD WHILST THE SILAGE, HAY AND CORN ARE KEPT AND USED AS CATTLE FEED, THIS IS AN ECONOMICAL WAY OF FEEDING THE CATTLE.
